\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}[ampersand replacement=\&]
	\& {L \times _X K} \& L \\
	{\,} \& K \& {K + L} \&\& {\,} \\
	\&\&\& X
	\arrow[hook, from=1-2, to=1-3]
	\arrow[hook, from=1-2, to=2-2]
	\arrow[hook, from=1-3, to=2-3]
	\arrow["j", curve={height=-12pt}, hook, from=1-3, to=3-4]
	\arrow[hook, from=2-2, to=2-3]
	\arrow["i"', curve={height=12pt}, hook, from=2-2, to=3-4]
	\arrow["\theta", dashed, from=2-3, to=3-4]
\end{tikzcd}
\end{document}
